com.idibon.api.http

Interface HttpInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JdkHttpInterface

    public interface HttpInterface
extends AutoCloseable
    Generic interface abstracting the HTTP methods that are used by the Idibon API client.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  HttpInterface.Property
      Various internal configuration properties for the interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Waits up to 60 seconds for pending operations to complete and shuts down any execution threads that were created.
      int getProperty(HttpInterface.Property property, int defaultValue)
      Returns an integer-valued configuration property for this interface, or a default value if no configuration is defined.
      HttpFuture<javax.json.JsonValue> httpDelete(String endpoint, javax.json.JsonObject body)
      Executes an HTTP DELETE method and transmits the serialized body to the specified endpoint.
      HttpFuture<javax.json.JsonValue> httpGet(String endpoint)
      Executes an HTTP GET method with no parameters to the specified endpoint.
      HttpFuture<javax.json.JsonValue> httpGet(String endpoint, javax.json.JsonObject body)
      Executes an HTTP GET method and transmits the serialized body to the specified endpoint.
      HttpFuture<javax.json.JsonValue> httpPost(String endpoint, javax.json.JsonObject body)
      Executes an HTTP POST method and transmits the serialized body to the specified endpoint.
      HttpFuture<javax.json.JsonValue> httpPut(String endpoint, javax.json.JsonObject body)
      Executes an HTTP PUT method and transmits the serialized body to the specified endpoint.
      void shutdown(long quiesceTime)
      Waits for pending operations to complete and shuts down any execution threads that were created.

    • Method Detail

      • httpGet

        HttpFuture<javax.json.JsonValue> httpGet(String endpoint)
        Executes an HTTP GET method with no parameters to the specified endpoint.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - URI-encoded endpoint for the request
        Returns:
        Decoded JSON response from the server

        Parameters:

        body - HTTP request body
        Returns:

      • getProperty

        int getProperty(HttpInterface.Property property,
                int defaultValue)
        Returns an integer-valued configuration property for this interface, or a default value if no configuration is defined.
        Parameters:
        property - Name of the configuration property
        defaultValue - The value to return if the property is not defined.
        Returns:
        The value of the property.

      • close

        void close()
        Waits up to 60 seconds for pending operations to complete and shuts down any execution threads that were created. Same as calling shutdown(60000).
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • shutdown

        void shutdown(long quiesceTime)
        Waits for pending operations to complete and shuts down any execution threads that were created.
        Parameters:
        quiesceTime - The maximum time to wait, in milliseconds.
